value_claims.claim_title: Arup Face Check provides high-confidence biometric assurance for quality and audit
value_claims.claim_description: Arup developed Face Check using Azure AI Services and Microsoft Entra Verified ID to enable employees to register photos for biometric assurance in remote or face-to-face transactions, enhancing security layers.
value_claims.source_quote: Arup Group utilized Microsoft Entra Verified ID, and other security solutions to develop Face Check, powered by Azure AI Services. Employees register a photo to maintain high-confidence biometric assurance for quality and audit purposes.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Face Check is explicitly powered by Azure AI Services, which directly enables the biometric assurance capability.

value_claims.claim_title: EchoStar Hughes projected to save 35,000 work hours with Azure AI Foundry apps
value_claims.claim_description: EchoStar Hughes created 12 production apps using Azure AI Foundry for automated sales call auditing, customer retention analysis, and field services automation, projected to save 35,000 work hours.
value_claims.source_quote: EchoStar Hughes division leveraged Microsoft Azure AI Foundry to create 12 new production apps, including automated sales call auditing, customer retention analysis, and field services process automation. These solutions are projected to save 35,000 work hours.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Azure AI Foundry directly enabled the creation of 12 production apps that generate the projected work hour savings.

value_claims.claim_title: EchoStar Hughes projected 25% productivity boost with Azure AI Foundry
value_claims.claim_description: The 12 production apps created using Azure AI Foundry are projected to boost productivity by at least 25% at EchoStar Hughes.
value_claims.source_quote: EchoStar Hughes division leveraged Microsoft Azure AI Foundry to create 12 new production apps...These solutions are projected to save 35,000 work hours and boost productivity by at least 25%.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Azure AI Foundry directly powers the apps that are projected to deliver the productivity boost.

value_claims.claim_title: Brisbane Catholic Education educators save 9.3 hours per week with Copilot Studio tool
value_claims.claim_description: Brisbane Catholic Education developed a generative AI tool using Microsoft Copilot Studio to integrate Catholic traditions into classrooms. Educators reported saving an average of 9.3 hours per week.
value_claims.source_quote: Brisbane Catholic Education equips Microsoft 365 Copilot and utilizes Microsoft Copilot Studio to develop a generative AI tool that helps integrate Catholic traditions and values into the classroom. Educators reported saving an average of 9.3 hours per week.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The generative AI tool built with Microsoft Copilot Studio directly enables the time savings reported by educators.

value_claims.claim_title: BKW processed media inquiries 50% faster with Edison platform
value_claims.claim_description: BKW developed Edison using Azure AI Foundry and Azure OpenAI services. Within two months, media inquiries were processed 50% faster.
value_claims.source_quote: BKW developed Edison, a platform using Microsoft Azure, Azure AI Foundry, and Azure OpenAI services, to securely and effectively tap into internal data. Within two months of its roll-out...media inquiries were processed 50% faster.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Edison platform powered by Azure AI services directly enabled the 50% faster processing of media inquiries.

value_claims.claim_title: BKW achieved 8% staff adoption of Edison within two months
value_claims.claim_description: Within two months of Edison's roll-out at BKW, 8% of staff were actively using the platform built on Azure AI services.
value_claims.source_quote: BKW developed Edison, a platform using Microsoft Azure, Azure AI Foundry, and Azure OpenAI services...Within two months of its roll-out, 8% of staff were actively using Edison.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Edison platform powered by Azure AI services is the tool being adopted by staff.

value_claims.claim_title: HELLENiQ ENERGY boosted productivity by 70% with Microsoft 365 Copilot
value_claims.claim_description: HELLENiQ ENERGY partnered with PwC to introduce Microsoft 365 Copilot and Copilot Studio, boosting productivity by 70%.
value_claims.source_quote: HELLENiQ ENERGY partnered with PwC to introduce Microsoft 365 Copilot and Copilot Studio to boost its productivity by 70% and reduced email processing time by 64%.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Microsoft 365 Copilot and Copilot Studio directly enabled the productivity boost.

value_claims.claim_title: HELLENiQ ENERGY reduced email processing time by 64% with Copilot
value_claims.claim_description: HELLENiQ ENERGY reduced email processing time by 64% after introducing Microsoft 365 Copilot and Copilot Studio.

value_claims.claim_title: Ma'aden saves up to 2,200 hours monthly with Microsoft 365 Copilot
value_claims.claim_description: Ma'aden used Microsoft 365 Copilot to enhance productivity, saving up to 2,200 hours monthly through more efficient email drafting, document creation, and data analysis.

value_claims.claim_title: MAIRE saves more than 800 working hours per month with Microsoft 365 Copilot

value_claims.claim_title: Access Holdings reduced code writing time from 8 hours to 2 hours with Copilot
value_claims.claim_description: Access Holdings Plc adopted Microsoft 365 Copilot, reducing code writing time from eight hours to two hours.

value_claims.attribution_evidence: Microsoft 365 Copilot directly assists in code writing, enabling the time reduction.

value_claims.attribution_evidence: Microsoft 365 Copilot directly accelerates chatbot development and deployment.

value_claims.claim_title: Access Holdings reduced presentation prep time from 6 hours to 45 minutes

value_claims.source_quote: Access Holdings Plc adopted Microsoft 365 Copilot, integrating generative AI into daily tools. As a result...presentations are prepared in 45 minutes instead of six hours.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Microsoft 365 Copilot directly assists in presentation creation, enabling the time reduction.

value_claims.source_quote: Allpay uses GitHub Copilot to help engineers and developers write code faster and with less effort, increasing productivity by 10% and delivery volume into production by 25%.

value_claims.claim_title: Allpay increased delivery volume to production by 25% with GitHub Copilot
